name: Afterdark: When Heroes Become Legends
blurb: Afterdark is a beat\u2019em up game for PC and mobile platforms, it takes place in a world of gothic horror where heroes battle the darkness

rewards.reward: Thanks for your support !!!! We are very happy that you made this effort to support us. As soon as the project is backed you will receive a special wallpaper of Afterdark.
This pledge will give you a digital copy of Afterdark: When Heroes Become Legends as also a special wallpaper. Thank you for the support and have a great time playing Afterdark.

This pledge will get you a digital copy of the game, the complete soundtrack, a digital artbook and the special HQ from the playable characters of Afterdark. Thanks for the support and enjoy your prizes,

This pledge will get you a digital copy of the game, the complete soundtrack, a digital artbook, our excluisive tutorial of how we made this game, the Making Of video, the special HQ from the playable characters of Afterdark and of course your name on the game credits. Thanks for the support and enjoy your prizes,

This pledge will give you lots of stuff! You'll receive your game with physical box as well as a digital copy of the game. You will also get a printed poster of Afterdark, special assets in-game, the complete soundtrack, a digital artbook, our excluisive tutorial of how we made this game, the Making Of video, the special HQ from the playable characters of Afterdark and of course your name on the game credits. Thanks for the support and enjoy your prizes,
